title: Clean Room 302
description: Deep cleaning required after checkout. Replace linens and restock amenities.

title: Fix Air Conditioning - Room 405
description: Guest reported AC unit not cooling properly. Check thermostat and refrigerant levels.

title: VIP Guest Arrival Setup - Suite 501
description: Prepare suite for VIP guest arriving at 3 PM. Include welcome amenities and fruit basket.

title: Restock Minibar - Room 218
description: Guest requested minibar restocking. Replace consumed items.

title: Inspect Fire Extinguishers - 3rd Floor
description: Monthly safety inspection of all fire extinguishers on third floor.

title: Arrange Airport Transfer
description: Book airport pickup for guest in Room 112 - Flight arrives at 9:30 AM.

title: Replace Bathroom Tiles - Room 330
description: Two cracked tiles in bathroom need replacement before next booking.

title: Laundry Service Pickup - Suite 602
description: Collect laundry items from VIP suite for express cleaning.

title: Conference Room Setup
description: Set up conference room A for 20-person business meeting tomorrow at 9 AM.

title: Lobby Window Cleaning
description: Clean all lobby windows inside and outside for improved appearance.

title: Replace Pool Filter
description: Scheduled maintenance - replace pool filtration system filter.

title: Restaurant Reservation - Party of 8
description: Make dinner reservation at hotel restaurant for guests in Rooms 205-206.

title: Carpet Cleaning - Hallway 4th Floor
description: Deep clean carpets in 4th floor hallway. Schedule during low-traffic hours.

title: Fix Leaking Faucet - Room 155
description: Guest reported dripping bathroom faucet. Replace washer or cartridge.

title: Special Dietary Request Setup
description: Arrange gluten-free breakfast items for guest in Room 444 (celiac disease).
